summary: Provides an Ansible module that extracts various archive formats (tar, tar.gz, tar.bz2, tar.xz, tar.zst, zip) on remote hosts, handling format detection, integrity checks, permission and ownership preservation, and idempotent extraction.
business_intent: Allow automated provisioning and deployment processes to unpack software packages, configuration bundles, or data archives reliably across different systems while maintaining original file attributes.
